channel.title: CVE Feed for RICOH COMPANY, LTD -- Ricoh Streamline NX PC Client
channel.description: The latest CVEs for RICOH COMPANY, LTD -- Ricoh Streamline NX PC Client

item.title: CVE-2024-36252|2024-08-02T03:37:03.680Z -- ricoh%20company%2C%20ltd -- ricoh%20streamline%20nx%20pc%20client
item.description: Improper restriction of communication channel to intended endpoints issue exists in Ricoh Streamline NX PC Client ver.3.6.x and earlier. If this vulnerability is exploited, arbitrary code may be executed on the PC where the product is installed.
